        public void searchSolution(int limitTime,
                           Repository repository,
                           java.util.HashMap<Delivery,java.util.HashMap<Delivery,AtomicPath>> allPaths,
                           int[] duration,
                           boolean continueInterruptedCalculation)
                    throws main.java.exception.TSPLimitTimeReachedException
        Description copied from interface: TSP
        Search solution.
        Specified by:
        searchSolution in interface TSP
        Parameters:
        limitTime - the limit time
        repository - the repository
        allPaths - all the paths between each delivery
        duration - duration for each delivery @unused
        continueInterruptedCalculation - true if the method is called after having interrupted the calculation at least once
        Throws:
        main.java.exception.TSPLimitTimeReachedException - when the limit time we set for the calculation is reached before the end of the calculation

        Continue research solution.
        Parameters:
        limitTime - the limit time after which the calculation have to stop, finished or not
        allPaths - all the AtomicPath between each Delivery in the deliveryList
        startingTime - the starting time
        Throws:
        main.java.exception.TSPLimitTimeReachedException - when the limit time we set for the calculation is reached before the end of the calculation

      • bound

        protected abstract int bound(Delivery delivery,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> nonViewed,
                             java.util.HashMap<Delivery,java.util.HashMap<Delivery,AtomicPath>> allPaths,
                             int[] duration)
        Method to redefine in the classes that extend TemplateTSP.
        Parameters:
        delivery - the delivery
        nonViewed - : list of the deliveries we still need to visit
        allPaths - : used as cost to go from every delivery to every other
        duration - : duration for each delivery @unused
        Returns:
        the minimum path starting and finishing by the repository, passing by every other delivery

      • branchAndBound

        private void branchAndBound(Delivery currentDelivery,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> nonViewed,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> viewed,
                            double viewedCost,
                            java.util.HashMap<Delivery,java.util.HashMap<Delivery,AtomicPath>> allPaths,
                            int[] duration,
                            long startingTime,
                            int limitTime)
                     throws main.java.exception.TSPLimitTimeReachedException
        Method that define the template of a resolution of the TSP by branch and bound
        Parameters:
        currentDelivery - the last delivery visited
        nonViewed - : list of the deliveries we still need to visit
        viewed - : list of the deliveries we have already visited
        viewedCost - : cost of the path we are building
        allPaths - : used as cost to go from every delivery to every other
        duration - : time spent to visit a delivery
        startingTime - : time when the resolution started
        limitTime - : maximum time that the resolution is allowed to take
        Throws:
        main.java.exception.TSPLimitTimeReachedException - when the limit time we set for the calculation is reached before the end of the calculation
